graph.original_query: Create a new tictactoe game that two people can play and when one user wins, they get a point. Users should be able to reset and play another game. Maintain and display points tally which is visually appealing. Have seperate files for HTML, JS and CSS. Use ONLY ONE step of CoderAgent but use MULTIPLE ITERATIONS (call_self=True) of the same step to enrich the game logic, visual or layout! You dont need any clarifications. You dont need to build reports. Use beautiful theme and colour schemes, layout etc. You get extra money for making this visually appealing! [Suggested Plan: Coder Agent -> QA Agent -> Coder Agent -> QA Agent]

nodes.description: Create the initial Tic Tac Toe game structure with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS files. Include scorekeeping, reset functionality, and basic game logic. Emphasize visual appeal, beautiful theme and colour schemes, layout etc. Add sufficient placeholders in all three files for future edits. Name files 'index.html', 'script.js', and 'style.css'.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Create a Tic Tac Toe game with the following features:

*   Two-player gameplay
*   Scorekeeping for each player
*   Reset button to start a new game
*   Visually appealing design with beautiful theme and colour schemes, layout etc.
*   Separate files for HTML (index.html), JavaScript (script.js), and CSS (style.css)

Ensure the code is well-structured and easy to modify in subsequent iterations. Use comments and placeholders (e.g., `<!-- UPDATE_ME -->`) where updates will likely be made. Don't include any HTML reports, or summaries. Add HTML comments to show what the code is doing, add JS comments also. Add CSS comments where necessary. Do not include any execution statements, just the code.

nodes.description: Review the initial Tic Tac Toe game for functionality, visual appeal, and code quality. Provide specific feedback for improvements.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Review the Tic Tac Toe game created in T001. Provide specific feedback on the following aspects:

*   Functionality: Ensure the game logic is correct (win conditions, draw conditions, reset functionality, scorekeeping).
*   Visual Appeal: Assess the overall design, color scheme, and layout. Suggest improvements to enhance the user experience.
*   Code Quality: Check for code clarity, structure, and maintainability. Provide suggestions for refactoring if necessary.

Provide a detailed list of actionable items for the next iteration.

nodes.description: Incorporate the feedback from the QA review in T002 to improve the Tic Tac Toe game's functionality, visual appeal, and code quality. Remember the names of files are index.html, script.js, and style.css. Make changes to the HTML, JS and CSS files from the previous task.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Based on the QA review in T002, update the Tic Tac Toe game. Specifically, address the following issues:

*   [Insert specific issues from T002]

Make sure to include previous code contents from Task T001 in the inputs. Remember the names of files are index.html, script.js, and style.css. Do not include any HTML reports, or summaries. Add HTML comments to show what the code is doing, add JS comments also. Add CSS comments where necessary. Do not include any execution statements, just the code.

nodes.description: Review the improved Tic Tac Toe game for functionality, visual appeal, and code quality. Provide specific feedback for improvements.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Review the improved Tic Tac Toe game created in T003. Provide specific feedback on the following aspects:

*   Functionality: Ensure the game logic is correct (win conditions, draw conditions, reset functionality, scorekeeping).
*   Visual Appeal: Assess the overall design, color scheme, and layout. Suggest improvements to enhance the user experience.
*   Code Quality: Check for code clarity, structure, and maintainability. Provide suggestions for refactoring if necessary.

Provide a detailed list of actionable items for the next iteration.

nodes.description: Incorporate the feedback from the QA review in T004 to further refine the Tic Tac Toe game's functionality, visual appeal, and code quality. Remember the names of files are index.html, script.js, and style.css. Make changes to the HTML, JS and CSS files from the previous task.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Based on the QA review in T004, update the Tic Tac Toe game. Specifically, address the following issues:

*   [Insert specific issues from T004]

Make sure to include previous code contents from Task T003 in the inputs. Remember the names of files are index.html, script.js, and style.css. Do not include any HTML reports, or summaries. Add HTML comments to show what the code is doing, add JS comments also. Add CSS comments where necessary. Do not include any execution statements, just the code.

nodes.description: Summarize the final Tic Tac Toe game creation. Do NOT generate HTML reports.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a summary of all the work from Task T005. Describe the game, its features, functionality, and visual elements. Do NOT generate HTML reports.
